context: Could you recommend any work by James Kinsley?
The Persuasion is a popular piece by him released in 1817.
A very good year. Northanger Abbey was from about then. I would probably enjoy Persuasion.
resp: Ah yes, If you liked that novel you would probably enjoy Persuasion. Also you may enjoy Emma which is the next in the series after Northanger Abbey.
